content: sonder socks designed by melissa clulow & mona schmidt s o n d e r s o c k s is a basic cuff-down sock recipe that provides instructions for incorporating contrast heels and toes using your favourite mini-skeins it also includes directions for two different rib treatments at the cuff as well as options for working the leg and top of foot in stockinette or in a simple 3 x 1 rib whether you re a beginner or more experienced sock knitter this pattern makes a great canvas for playing with colour or even trying out your own stitch and texture ideas to create your own unique design sonder yarn co | sonderyarnco com | @sonderyarnco | #sonderyarnco sonder socks | page 2 yarn sonder sock 80% merino 20% nylon 365 m 400 y / 100 g 1 full skein mc + 2 mini skeins cc1 and cc2 -
